name: ClanDescuento
overview:
ClanDescuento.com born in early 2010 as an initiative of Needish Inc., a young company located in Santiago de Chile.

The aim is to bring together ClanDescuento.com force consumers to get great deals on products and services that would be impossible to achieve individually. So every day is published an exclusive discount, but it is valid only if you get a minimum of guests within 24 hours or while you are posted on the site.

In ClanDescuento.com offer discounts that you really will find interesting. Discount real, unique and designed and negotiated for you. When we think of discounts, we think our users, and we are always happy to listen to what discounts you would like to access.
